trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Hudson

Summary: A large cylinder or possible round shaped silver white object very high 50.thousand feet or more over florida heading south
divs: Sighting Detailsin front yard hudson florida at 11 AFTER 2 PM IN VERY CLEAR SKIES mULTIPLE WITNESS SAW A SILVER WHITE GLOWING OBJECT VERY HIGH HEADING SOUTH OVER PASCO CT FL, IT NEVER CHANGED DIRECTION IT STAYED VERY SMOOTH NO VAPOR TRAIL NO VISIBLE WINGS LOOKED TO BE VERY LARGE AND OVER 45THOUSAND FEET HIGH AND ALSO BECAUSE OF HIGHT VERY FAST WE HAD WALKED OUTSIDE TO SEE A HIGH ALT BLACKHAWK CHOPPER FLY OVER WHEN WE SAW THIS OBJECT FIRST IT DID NOT SEEM TO HAVE ANY RELATION TO THE BLACKHAWK WE HAVE ALOT OF MILITARY TRAFFIC IN THIS AREA BUT THIS IS THE FIRST TIME IVE COME ACROSS THIS TYPE OF THING IN THE SKY WE LOOKED UP NASA WEBSITE AND THE ISS IS NOT IN OUR AREA THIS EVENT HAPPENED 10 MIN AGO SO IF YOUR IN FLORIDA LOOK UP! IT WENT OUT OF SITE OVER STPETE TAMPA SOUTH OF US
